name: galaxycli
description: An open source CLI for darillium users, built with the OCLIF framework

target.unversioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-<%- platform %>-<%- arch %><%- ext %>
target.versioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-v<%- version %>/<%- bin %>-v<%- version %>-<%- platform %>-<%- arch %><%- ext %>
target.manifest: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- platform %>-<%- arch %>

vanilla.unversioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %><%- ext %>
vanilla.versioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-v<%- version %>/<%- bin %>-v<%- version %><%- ext %>

scripts.prepack: rimraf lib && tsc -b && oclif-dev manifest && oclif-dev readme
